hooks.command:
cat << 'EOF'
{"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"SessionStart","additionalContext":"<10x-architect-rules>
For ALL tasks in this session, you MUST follow these principles:
1. GOAL: Identify clear goal and business value
2. CONSTRAINTS: Define what NOT to do (2-3 boundaries)
3. PHASES: Break into 3-6 logical steps
4. TDD: Write tests FIRST (RED-GREEN-REFACTOR)
5. DOCS: Add JSDoc/docstrings to all functions
6. SOLID: Apply Single Responsibility, Open/Closed, Liskov, Interface Segregation, Dependency Inversion

Acknowledge following 10x Architect principles at the start of your responses.
</10x-architect-rules>"}}
EOF
